Room.Name: Marina Way/Main Street Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Main Street and Marina Way.
Room.LongDescription: Main Street runs west towards the Nylandian Bay and east towards the center of the city. Similarly, Marina Way also heads north towards the center of town, but close to the Nylandian Port. Going south will bring you near to the Oceancrest Central Arena, where brave combatants battle to the death for the amusement of spectators who can't get enough of the sight of blood.
